title: Halloween Stories for Kids & More: 17 Assorted Stories to Read with Kids at Halloween
description: This giant collection of wonderful stories is full of lessons for growing kids and lovable characters that kids will look up to. The simple vocabulary and easy to understand concepts make these stories perfect for growing boys and girls.Parents and grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their children and grandchildren.** Click "Buy Now with 1 Click" to reserve your copy forever**
author: Betty J. Byers
